name: Giresun
description:
This is a 3rd person shooter game created with Unreal Engine 5

There is Elimination mode and Control mode in game that you can play 1v1, 2v2, 4v4, 5v5 versions.
In Elimination mode, you are defeating enemy and when a team reach enough points, wins.
In Control mode, there will be 3 areas, you can capture an area and defend it. If you control 2 or more areas, you will start to collect points and when a team reach enough points, wins.

This is not an online multiplayer game. You are playing against bots.

It is a free game and there is no marketplace in it.

In 2024 we are planning to add new maps like Giresun Island and Giresun Castle and much more maps with new mods.

Have Fun !
